title: Issue with selecting items in library outline view
description:
Description: When using the library outline view, it is not possible to select any item on the first attempt. The focus automatically jumps to the library file node instead.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Try to select any item within the library outline view.

Observed Behavior: Any item can't be selected at the first time in the library outline view. The focus jumps to the library file node in the outline view.

Expected Behavior: When clicking on an item in the library outline view, the item should be selected without the focus being automatically redirected to the library file node.

Steps to Reproduce:
